name: Asteroids (SandwichCafe)
description:
Asteroids (SandwichCafe) is a recreation of the Atari 2600 Game

Instructions:

Use Space, Z key, or click to use the pellets and to destroy the asteroids coming towards you

Press F to toggle FPS Counter

Use Up arrow key or W key to go forward
Use Left and Right Key or A D Keys to turn
